CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 4, 1954, pg. 7 reads: "B'nai B'rith Thanksgiving Party - On Wednesday, Nov. 24, Freedom Lodge of B'nai B'rith distributed Thanksgiving baskets to twenty-seven needy families in district. The committee shown above, left to right, consisted of Sidney Shugarman, chairman; Howard Kaufman, Beryl Grottstein and Sidney Farber.  Other members, not shown, were Robert Silverman, Norman Harlich, Ed Turner, Jack Hausman, Leon Younger and Nathaniel Feinberg. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Freedom Lodge of B'nai B'rith members, from left: Sidney Shugarman, Howard Kaufman, Beryl Grottstein, and Sidney Farber, posed with table of Thanksgiving baskets to distribute to needy families, posed in interior with light colored cider block brick walls
